infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Hapien needs camera access to take photos for your profile and posts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Hapien needs photo library access to share photos in posts and set your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Hapien needs permission to save photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Hapien uses your location to show nearby hangouts and communities.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Hapien can help you find friends from your contacts.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This allows Hapien to provide a personalized experience and measure app performance.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Hapien to access your camera to take photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Hapien to access your photos to share in posts.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Hapien to use your location to find nearby hangouts.
